name: VCR STAR
description:
You are home alone and for some reason the tv keeps looping the same program over and over. You aren't sure what happened to cause this but you are bored  of watching the same old episode of LionMan. You should take your VHS tape and try making your own scenes using clips from the show! Your VHS tape only has 15 seconds of storage though.. What a Bummer.

Paste your VHS tape codes in the comments. I'd love to see what you come up with!

If you get stuck or just want to cheat, you can paste these codes into the load video field and it will load in pre-edited VHS tapes for each scene the game wants you to make.

Cheat Codes
